name: Stickman Soccer Ball Slide: Final Escape
name_original: Stickman Soccer Ball Slide: Final Escape
description:
Can you outrun your enemies and make it through a dangerous area at the same time? The world seems to be crashing down around you as soccer balls fly through the air and try to land on your head, but that's okay! You've got this covered. If you have the dexterity and skill you think you do, this won't be a problem at all...or will it?

Tilt the device from side to side to move your stickman and avoid being clobbered. It's not as easy as it sounds, especially since the ball falling around you are coming at a fast pace and are bent on destroying you.

It's up to you to get your stickman through the game safely. Do you think you have what it takes? Don't give up too soon! You'll want to keep playing until you've mastered it.

Features:
* Great for all ages
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
